abstract: After a string of uneven days, the stock market closed mostly lower last week amid renewed inflation fears.
snippet: After a string of uneven days, the stock market closed mostly lower last week amid renewed inflation fears.
lead_paragraph: After a string of uneven days, the stock market closed mostly lower last week amid renewed inflation fears. Announcements of big merger plans — between Sirius Satellite Radio and XM Satellite Radio, and between Whole Foods and Wild Oats Markets — were not enough to offset investors’ mild economic gloom.

headline.main: Investors Mostly Glum in a Short Trading Week
headline.print_headline: Investors Mostly Glum in a Short Trading Week
